meanings.definition: Not having a mutual relationship or connection.
meanings.sent1: The colors of the two cars were uncorrelated.
meanings.sent2: The weather and my mood seemed uncorrelated today.
meanings.sent3: It was uncorrelated how the cat and the dog both napped at the same time.
meanings.sent4: Her uncorrelated thoughts floated around like scattered puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The uncorrelated stars in the sky sparkled brightly.

meanings.definition: Not showing a consistent pattern or relationship.
meanings.sent1: The stock prices were uncorrelated with the company's performance.
meanings.sent2: Her uncorrelated study habits led to unpredictable test results.
meanings.sent3: It was uncorrelated how the traffic lights always turned red when she was in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The uncorrelated beats of the music created a chaotic dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The uncorrelated shapes in the painting seemed to dance on their own.
